data.title: [ci skip] Add Skybox parser to js
Are you killing the support for Box2d Physics engine?
data.body:
I am making a game for linux , windows and  mac, but my main aim was linux for the upcoming steam os. I don't see a good tutorial on setting up the project in linux and compiling for linux platform so I used clion, everything works fine but not on windows which I had to use visual studio which is so slow when building. my project compile fine, as I am about to start my journey in Physics game, and tried using Box2d but failed to integrate it.

Are you killing the support for Box2d as physics engine in the future? its seems that the default enabled physics engine for the engine is chipmunk, and currently you have this Physics engine which is based on chipmunk also, which also has a good documentation. 

I can't enable box2d since it would cause so many compile error.  I thought Box2d was enable already and just ready for me to include since in your documentation it was not stated. Please help me on this one.

I using clion on ubuntu for editing and compiling for linux
and visual studio for windows. currently can't do mac. to expensive

data.title: moving SpritePolygon::triangulate / calculateUV to DrawNode
data.body: I would like to know if its possible to move/add the triangulate and calculateUV functions of SpritePolygon to the DrawNode. I'd like to use this functions for a SVG parsed Polygon. The polygon needs to get tessellated and UVs would be handy for custom FragmentShader.

data.title: wrong clipping effect of ScrollView while rotated
data.body:
if rotation is 90 or -90, it will total black.
between 0 and 90, the clipping is always screen direction's rect

data.title: for issue #12792: ScrollView::onTouchBegan miss touch while rotated
data.body: use the code in Widget instead of original implemention of ScrollView

data.title: ScrollView::onTouchBegan miss touch while rotated
data.body:
original code is "convert rect frame and check is touch hit in"
the implemention of Widget::onTouchBegan is "convert touch point to self node space and check"

data.title: add skipAction interface
Canvas transform calculation issue
data.body:
Originally reported: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-js/issues/1781 by @Dolaham

@ZhangMenghe Please confirm this issue.

> For example:
> If you have 3 sprites: a, b, c.
> a is b's parent. b is c's parent.
> set b's scaleX to -1. then set a's rotation to some value nonzero.
> The visual layout is fine in WebGL mode, but totally wrong in canvas.
> I have to run my game in IE.
> Please help to fix this problem. I will be appreciative

data.title: Updated AudioEngine to enable setting pitch of a playing sound file.
data.body:
Updated AudioEngine to enable setting pitch of a playing effect. Updated applied to iOS, Mac, Android, WinRT and Win32.

Valid pitch range is [0.5,2.0]. 

Setting pitch on all platforms affects the playback speed and effective pitch of the audio file.

Demo Video: http://youtu.be/4iX9gct5kvM

This is a great feature to simulate a motor sound, or many other effects.

The pitch/rate changing behavior, as designed and tested, seems to be identical across Mac, iOS, Android, WinRT and Win32. 

Tested on Macbook Pro, iOS iPhone 5 device, Android 4.4.4 Nexus 7 2012, WinRT Nokia Lumina 928W and Win32 simulator.

The test project that I used is located here. It is mostly the same code from the New Audio Engine test case. https://github.com/jimrange/AudioEnginePitchTest
